Ingredients.7: 5 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste

Ingredients.8: 1 inch piece ginger, peeled and diced

Ingredients.11: 1 cup cooked brown rice, or more to taste

Ingredients.12: 1 head romaine lettuce, chopped, or to taste

Ingredients.14: 1  red bell pepper, diced, or to taste (Optional)

Ingredients.15: 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, or to taste (Optional)

Directions.1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain and discard grease. Mix in sesame oil.

Directions.2: Combine brown sugar, soy sauce, water, Asian pear, garlic, ginger, red pepper flakes, and black pepper in a food processor. Blend until combined but still slightly chunky. Pour mixture into the skillet with the beef and cook over medium heat until most of the liquid evaporates, 7 to 9 minutes.

Directions.3: Place 1/4 the cooked brown rice in the bottom of an individual serving bowl. Top with a portion of beef mixture, lettuce, cucumber, red bell pepper, and sesame seeds. Repeat with remaining rice, beef, and toppings.
